location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 481: Lieutenant-Colonel Samuel Hennell, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire, to His Excellency Lieutenant-Colonel Justin Sheil CB, Her Majesty's Minister Plenipotentiary and Envoy Extraordinary at the Court of Persia, Tehran

mods.abstract: Samuel Hennell forwards copies of his letters to His Excellency Lieutenant-Colonel Justin Sheil CB, Her Majesty's Minister at the Court of Persia. The letters (nos. 451, 462, 470, 474, 475 and 476) are not included here, but nos. 451 and 470 do appear earlier in the file (see ff.220-221 and f.222 respectively).
